titleStmt.title: The Protestant Church existent, and their faith professed in all ages, and by whom with a catalogue of councels in all ages, who professed the same. Written, by Henry Rogers D.D. prebendary of Hereford.
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Henry, ca. 1585-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Badger [and Marmaduke Parsons],

notesStmt.note: Mostly a reply to John Fisher.
Parsons' name from STC; Badger apparently printed only the first quire (STC addendum).
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
